General.Name: Coelacanth Energy Inc.
General.Description: Coelacanth Energy Inc. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas in Canada. It holds an average 95% working interest in approximately 96,960 net acres of land in the Two Rivers area of northeastern British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
